question: The lekpz M41 Bulldog had a 156mm main cannon.
The BF109 tropical variant had its engine manufactured by Daimler-Benz.
The UH1C 'Huey Hog' utilized a 20mm coaxial minigun mounted on its nose.
The AH1F SuperCobra was used in Vietnam as a light attack helicopter.
The Focke Wulf FW190 utilized a radial engine.
The UH1C 'Huey Hog' implemented a mesh screen air filter for its turbine in order to protect it from dust in the harsh Vietnamese conditions.
The UH1Y twin Venom was used widely in Vietnam theatres, particularly in Da Nang.
The DeHavilland Hornet was used widely for air support in Afghanistan.
The 'toe popper' was used widely against US forces by the Vietnamese.
